troubleshooting.title: How to Convert a WebHelp Responsive Template from 18/19 to 20 version
troubleshooting.abstract: The WebHelp Responsive version 20 introduces the concept that defines all aspects of the layout and styles of the WebHelp Responsive output. It is a self-contained customization package distributed as a ZIP archive, making it easy to share with others.

condition.title: What are the main differences?
condition.p: There are two main differences between templates from 18/19 and 20 versions:

li.p: In the 18/19 version, the template directory structure was fixed.

cause.title: The template from 18/19 version could not be used in 20 version
cause.p: When you have created the template for 18/19 version, you have started from an existing template following the Creating WebHelp Responsive Templates procedure.

remedy.title: Generate the corresponding Publishing Template for 20 version

cause.title: HTML Page Templates are not compatible
Resource are not copied to output folder

remedy.title: Specify output resources in Publishing Template Descriptor
